description:
Have you ever been asked to provide evaluations of either yourself or of your team members?
Were you able to provide the evaluations with confidence and accuracy? or did you recall the last bad thing they have done?

This handy app will allow you to shine during evaluation time:
  Whether it is your own evaluation so you can obtain that promotion by specifying how your contributions align to your organizational goals
  or if you are a manager or team lead providing fair and accurate feedback to gain respect and trust from your team.

High level features:
  Record behaviors for an unlimited number of team members and unlimited number of organizational goals
  Align each team member's contributions to your organization's goals
  Rank and quantify your own or each team member's contributions and be able to tag with specific examples
  Identify who are the top contributors on your team
  List all contributions based on organizational objectives
  See each member's contributions and monitor their progress

Please provide suggestions for improvement
